reviewText: I  didn;t care to much for the screenplay.of this movie did not like what happeened to jennifer s character but none the less it was inteeresting
I thought that I was purchasing a valid non bootleg old VHS tape of this movie. I purchased several and they were all the same very blurry degraded vhs copy.

A very good movie.  I had watched it years ago, and it was one of my favorite movies.  I decided to try to find it.  I found it on Amazon in record time.  I enjoyed seeing it again very much.  I highly recommend this movie to anyone who likes the Civil War.
Will this ever see the light of day on DVD? I hope so. An excellent movie for it's time!
